lessons.japanese: 最善を尽くす限りは援助してあげよう。
lessons.english: I'll help you so long as you do your best.

lessons.japanese: 環境を汚染しないよう我々は最善を尽くすべきである。
lessons.english: We ought to do our best not to pollute our environment.

lessons.japanese: 我々は出来る限り手を尽くすと信じて下さい。
lessons.english: You may rest assured that we shall do all we can.

lessons.japanese: 英国は各人がその本分を尽くすことを期待する。
lessons.english: England expects that every man will do his duty.

lessons.japanese: 我々は最善を尽くすべきだ。
もう一度チャンスが与えられれば、彼は最善を尽くすだろう。
lessons.english: Should he be given another chance, he would do his best.

lessons.japanese: どの道に進んでも最善を尽くすべきだ。
lessons.english: Whatever course you may take, you must do your best.

lessons.japanese: どの先生も最善を尽くす。
とにかくベストを尽くすつもりだ。
lessons.english: At any rate, I will do my best.

lessons.japanese: あなたの家を思う熱心が、わたしを食い尽くす。
lessons.english: Zeal for your house will consume me.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は定刻にここへ来るように全力を尽くすでしょう。
lessons.english: She will do her best to be here on time.

lessons.japanese: 彼らは自分の最善を尽くすことが大切だ。
lessons.english: It is important for them to do their best.

lessons.japanese: 彼は仕事を終えるよう全力を尽くすだろう。
lessons.english: He'll do his best to finish the job.
